hadiths.text: It was narrated that Khuraim bin Fatik said:"The Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) said: 'Whoever spends in the cause of Allah, it will be recorded for him seven hundred fold

chapter.ara-name: باب فَضْلِ النَّفَقَةِ فِي سَبِيلِ اللَّهِ تَعَالَى .
chapter.eng-name: The Virtue Of Spending In The cause Of Allah
